cause.description:
We help churches work together to reach teenagers for Jesus Christ. Pete Malik and Travis Deans are the coordinators. AKA Teens For Christ.
1. every church should have a healthy, growing youth ministry
2. every community needs a network of church youth ministries
3. every school needs reached by a network of churches
4. every student needs to hear the gospel and get connected with a local church
cause.name: Fayette County Youth Network
